name: EndSandbox
description: Ends a sandbox with CloudShell Colony
author: Quali

inputs.name: colonyEndpoint
inputs.label: Colony server URL
inputs.helpMarkDown: Select the Colony end point to use. If needed, click on 'manage', and add a new service connection of type 'Colony Service connection'

inputs.name: space
inputs.label: Space name
inputs.helpMarkDown: Enter a name for your CloudShell Colony space.

inputs.name: sandboxId
inputs.label: Sandbox ID
inputs.helpMarkDown: Enter the ID of the sandbox you want to end. Use $(Colony.Sandbox_Id) to dynamically get the sandbox Id from the CloudShell Colony object that was returned from a Start Sandbox task.
